data.name: Paths of the Sentinels
data.detailed_description:
Paths of the Sentinels is an action roguelike with dungeon crawler elements.

Explore procedurally-generated mines: Fight enemies, discover treasures, and acquire new weapons & armor to make each run unique!


Save the Village
The miners in the village have been overrun! It's up to you to clear each of the three mines and ultimately defeat the Sentinels that lie within them.

Discover New Gear
Collect (or purchase) a variety of weapons and armor that have unique stats each time you pick them up! Combine your gear with the right trinkets to optimize your build.

Manage Your Money
As you explore the mines you will acquire both Gold and Silver. These two currencies can be spent in a variety of ways, and you will have to decide how to best make use of them during each run.
data.about_the_game:

Explore procedurally-generated mines: Fight enemies, discover treasures, and acquire new weapons & armor to make each run unique!

Manage Your Money
As you explore the mines you will acquire both Gold and Silver. These two currencies can be spent in a variety of ways, and you will have to decide how to best make use of them during each run.
data.short_description: Defeat the monsters that have overtaken the mines in this action roguelike/dungeon crawler! Wield a variety of weapons, acquire new abilities from trinkets, and utilize the services within the village to thwart its imminent demise.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 (or comparable AMD)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (or comparable AMD)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
